content: get ready for spooky season with these adorable amigurumi witch hats whether you use them as a simple halloween decoration or a fun fall-themed gift these hats are the perfect quick project for an autumn afternoon for this pattern any worsted weight yarn will do scraps from your stash work well **size** approx 6 cm 2 4 in tall diameter of brim is 8 5 cm 3 3 in **materials & tools** * worsted weight yarn of your choice in 2 colours * polyester toy stuffing * one pair of us 4/3 5mm knitting needles * tapestry needle **difficulty level** beginner **knitting techniques used + abbreviations** k knit k2tog knit 2 together kfb knit front and back co cast on bobble bind off st s stitch es happy knitting
